Name: Wild West VR
About the game: Wild West VR is a first-person shooter unfolding in a western setting. Two gamepads are used as weapons. The interface is maximum smooth. Game features have been enhanced with the introduction of the waves of attacks of various levels of difficulty. Game Features An artificial intelligence (AI) provides the player with a challenging battle against a virtual opponent Lightweight game design that would deliver an entertaining interactive experience to the player Game design shifted to controllers to make the gameplay feel natural Leaderboard
Meta Title: Wild West VR: Jun 15, 2018, VironIT and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Wild West VR? Check out the release date (Jun 15, 2018), developer insights from VironIT, and a complete game summary.
